Home » 40P17 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)
20 Kusalattika, Sanidassanattika
Kusalattika, Sanidassanattika
33.
86Abyākato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo naabyākatassa nasanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Tīṇi veditakaṃ kātabbaṃ.)
87Ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate cha.
34.
88Abyākataṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanasappaṭigho ca naakusalo naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
89Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
35.
90Kusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
91Akusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
92Abyākataṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
93Kusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca abyākataṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
94Akusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca abyākataṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
95Hetuyā pannarasa, adhipatiyā pannarasa…pe…  aññamaññe tīṇi…pe…  vipāke tīṇi…pe…  avigate pannarasa.
